title: Ye Rasathi Rosapoo Lyrics En Uyir Thozhan
stanzas:
Ye Rasathi Rosapoo
va va va
adiye seemaatti
poochootti va va va

devadhaye ..
thirumagale..(2)
maanganiye managalae
maalai soodum gunamagale

Ye Rasathi Rosapoo
va va va
adiye seemaatti
poosoodi va va va

kangal imai moodum podhum
unadhanbu enadhanbai thaedum
manjam irandaana podhum
nam ennam ondraaga thoongum

thoora irundhum
arugil iruppom
thanithu irundhum
inaindhu iruppom

aagaayam poo pandhal
angae pon oonjal
neeyaada adhil naanaada
neram vandhaada..(2)

minnum velli meengalai
maeni engum sooduven
medai ennum dheviyai
aadai endru mooduven

angam engum thangam
hey engum inbam pongum

Ye Rasathi Rosapoo
va va va
adiye seemaatti
poochootti va va va

devadhaye ..
thirumagale..(2)
maanganiye managalae
maalai soodum gunamagale

Ye Rasathi Rosapoo
va va va
adiye seemaatti
poosoodi va va va

pandhalittu parisampottu
sondham koodi naal kurikka(2)

ammi midhithu arundhadi
paarthu azhagaaga mangaiku
maalai anindhu
mangala vaathiyam mandhiram
mulanga manjal kayiru
manikaluthil aeridum
annaal ...

vaanveliyil poo virithu
kanbom mudhal iravu
thaen mozhiyil
isai thaan kalandhu
padippom inaindhirundhu (2)

Vaanum indha boomiyum
naanum thandhen seedhanam
kayyil vandha poovudan
kadhal malar poovanam

kannae kadhal penne
kaaman koyil
vaasal munnae

Ye Rasathi Rosapoo
va va va
adiye seemaatti
poochootti va va va

devadhaye ..
thirumagale..(2)
maanganiye managalae
maalai soodum gunamagale

Ye Rasathi Rosapoo
va va va
adiye seemaatti
poosoodi va va va
